div.p: LPS will meet the needs of each learner by providing instruction that results in problem-solving, communication, and technology skills.

b.br:
202 West 3rd Street
P.O. Box 489
Louisville, NE 68037

h4.img: Following the order provided by Governor Ricketts, Louisville Public Schools will be closed through the end of May. At this time, that includes the entire facility including but not limited to: parking lots, the track, football field, basketball courts, and both playgrounds.

div.h4: Thank you for your patience and understanding, as we navigate his unprecedented situation. The district intends to utilize multiple avenues to communicate with our students and families, if you have any questions please let us know.
